Series I: Writings, Articles and Notes

Writings, Clippings, Notes: Speech- "Strengthen the Fight For Peace"/ "A Reply to a Reply" (Article, Clipping, Correspondence to NY Times)/ "Collaboration or Military Confrontation"/ "America's National Purpose and Goal"/ "The General Political Resolution"/ "Imperialist Reaction Menaces Achievements of Anti-Fascist Victory". Notes: For "July Article"/ "Slogans for November 7th"
